mapper.insert:
insert into gosu values(gosu_seq.nextval,#{gsouNo},#{gosuTitle},#{gosuSelf},#{gosuExplain},#{gosuAct},#{gosuCost},to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'))
select max(ggosu_no) from gosu
mapper.select:
select ggosu_no as ggsouNo, gosu_no as gsouNo, gosu_title as gosuTitle, gosu_self as gosuSelf, gosu_explain as gosuExplain, gosu_act as gosuAct, gosu_cost as gosuCost, gosu_date as gosuDate , gosu_id as gosuId
from (select rownum as rnum , r.*,(select member_id from member where member_no = r.gosu_no) as gosu_id from ( select * from gosu order by 1 desc )r)rr
select member_id as gosuId from member where member_no = (select gosu_no from gosu where ggosu_no = #{ggosuNo})

select ggosu_no as ggsouNo, gosu_no as gsouNo, gosu_title as gosuTitle, gosu_self as gosuSelf, gosu_explain as gosuExplain, gosu_act as gosuAct, gosu_cost as gosuCost, gosu_date as gosuDate from gosu where ggosu_no = #{ggosuNo}
select gproject_no as gprojectNo, ggosu_no as ggsouNo, gproject_title as gprojectTitle, gproject_content as gprojectContent, filepath as gprojectFilepath from gosu_project where ggosu_no = #{ggsouNo}
select file_no as fileNo, ggosu_no as ggsouNo, filepath as photoFilepath from gosu_photo where ggosu_no = #{ggsouNo}

select gnotice_no as gnoticeNo, member_id as writeId, gnotice_title as gnoticeTitle, gnotice_content as gnoticeContent, gnotice_photo as gnoticePhoto, gnotice_date as gnoticeDate from gosu_notice where gnotice_no = #{gnoticeNo}
select * from (select rownum as rnum , r.* from ( select gnotice_no as gnoticeNo, gnotice_photo as gnoticePhoto from gosu_notice order by 1 desc )r)rr where rnum between 1 and 6
select * from (select rownum as rnum , r.* from (select member_no as gosuNo, member_id as gosuId, filepath as gosuImg from member where member_type=2 order by 1 desc )r)rr where rnum between 1 and 4
select count(*) from member where member_type=2
select gproject_no as gprojectNo, ggosu_no as ggsouNo, gproject_title as gprojectTitle, gproject_content as gprojectContent, filepath as gprojectFilepath from gosu_project where gproject_no = #{gNo}
mapper.insert:
insert into gosu_feedback values(GOSU_FB_SEQ.nextval,#{ggosuNo},#{feedbackContent},#{feedbackTitle},to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),1,#{memberId})
select max(FEEDBACK_NO) from gosu_feedback
mapper.select: select FEEDBACK_NO as feedbackNo, GGOSU_NO as ggosuNo, FEEDBACK_CONTENT as feedbackContent, FEEDBACK_TITLE as feedbackTitle, FEEDBACK_DATE as feedbackDate, FEEDBACK_NUM as feedbackNum, MEMBER_ID as memberId from gosu_feedback where FEEDBACK_NO = #{fbNo}

select FEEDBACK_NO as feedbackNo, GGOSU_NO as ggosuNo, FEEDBACK_CONTENT as feedbackContent, FEEDBACK_TITLE as feedbackTitle, FEEDBACK_DATE as feedbackDate, FEEDBACK_NUM as feedbackNum, MEMBER_ID as memberId from gosu_feedback where MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
select TALK_NO as talkNo, FEEDBACK_NO as feedbackNo, WRITER as writer, TALK_CONTENT as talkContent, TALK_DATE as talkDate, FILEPATH, FILENAME from gosu_talk where FEEDBACK_NO = #{fbNo}

select FEEDBACK_NO as feedbackNo, GGOSU_NO as ggosuNo, FEEDBACK_CONTENT as feedbackContent, FEEDBACK_TITLE as feedbackTitle, FEEDBACK_DATE as feedbackDate, FEEDBACK_NUM as feedbackNum, MEMBER_ID as memberId from gosu_feedback where ggosu_no= (select ggosu_no from gosu where gosu_no = (select member_no from member where member_id=#{memberId}))
select MEMBER_ID as memberId from gosu_feedback where FEEDBACK_NO = #{feedbackNo}

select ggosu_no as ggsouNo, gosu_no as gsouNo, gosu_title as gosuTitle, gosu_self as gosuSelf, gosu_explain as gosuExplain, gosu_act as gosuAct, gosu_cost as gosuCost, gosu_date as gosuDate from(select * from gosu) where gosu_no= (select member_no from member where member_id=#{memberId})

select REQUEST_NO as requestNo, REQUEST_WRITER_NO as requestWriterNo, REQUEST_CONTENT1 as requestContent1, REQUEST_CONTENT2 as requestContent2, REQUEST_CONTENT3 as requestContent3, REQUEST_CONTENT4 as requestContent4, REQUEST_CONTENT5 as requestContent5, REQUEST_CONTENT6 as requestContent6, REQUEST_CONTENT7 as requestContent7, REQUEST_DATE as requsetDate from gosu_request where REQUEST_NO = #{mrn}

select COST_NO as costNo, GOSU_NO as gosuNo, REQUEST_NO as requestNo, COST_CONTENT as costContent, cost, COST_DATE as costDate, MEMBER_ID as memberId from gosu_request_cost where REQUEST_NO = #{requestNo} and GOSU_NO =#{gosuNo}
select COST_NO as costNo, GOSU_NO as gosuNo, REQUEST_NO as requestNo, COST_CONTENT as costContent, cost, COST_DATE as costDate, MEMBER_ID as memberId from gosu_request_cost where COST_NO = #{costNo}
select count(*) from gosu_request
mapper.insert:
insert into gosu_request_project_sub values(g_request_project_sub_seq.nextval,#{requestNo},#{costNo},1,to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'))
select max(REQUEST_PROJECT_SUB_NO) from gosu_request_project_sub
mapper.select: select pro.REQUEST_PROJECT_NO as requestProjectNo, pro.MEMBER_NO as memberNo, pro.REQUEST_PROJECT_CONTENT as requestProjectContent, pro.REQUEST_PROJECT_DATE as requestProjectDate, pro.FILEPATH, pro.FILENAME, pro.REQUEST_PROJECT_SUB_NO as requestProjectSubNo, (select member_id from member where member_no = pro.member_no) as memberId, (select filepath from member where member_no = pro.member_no) as memberImg from(select * from gosu_request_project where REQUEST_PROJECT_SUB_NO=#{rpsNo})pro

select (select member_id from member where member_no = request.request_writer_no) AS requestWriterId, (select filepath from member where member_no = request.request_writer_no) as requestWriterImg, sub.REQUEST_PROJECT_SUB_NO as requestProjectSubNo, sub.REQUEST_NO as requestNo, sub.COST_NO as costNo, sub.REQUEST_PROJECT_SUB_NUM as requestProjectSubNum, sub.REQUEST_PROJECT_SUB_DATE as requestProjectSubDate, (select member_id from member where member_no = cost.gosu_no) as gosuId, (select filepath from member where member_no = cost.gosu_no) as gosuImg from gosu_request_project_sub sub LEFT JOIN gosu_request request ON sub.request_no = request.request_no LEFT JOIN gosu_request_COST cost ON sub.cost_no = cost.cost_no WHERE sub.REQUEST_PROJECT_SUB_NO = #{rpsNo}

select (select member_id from member where member_no = request.request_writer_no) AS requestWriterId, (select filepath from member where member_no = request.request_writer_no) as requestWriterImg, sub.REQUEST_PROJECT_SUB_NO as requestProjectSubNo, sub.REQUEST_NO as requestNo, sub.COST_NO as costNo, sub.REQUEST_PROJECT_SUB_NUM as requestProjectSubNum, sub.REQUEST_PROJECT_SUB_DATE as requestProjectSubDate, (select member_id from member where member_no = cost.gosu_no) as gosuId, (select filepath from member where member_no = cost.gosu_no) as gosuImg from gosu_request_project_sub sub LEFT JOIN gosu_request request ON sub.request_no = request.request_no LEFT JOIN gosu_request_COST cost ON sub.cost_no = cost.cost_no WHERE request.request_writer_no =#{memberNo}

select (select member_id from member where member_no = request.request_writer_no) AS requestWriterId, (select filepath from member where member_no = request.request_writer_no) as requestWriterImg, sub.REQUEST_PROJECT_SUB_NO as requestProjectSubNo, sub.REQUEST_NO as requestNo, sub.COST_NO as costNo, sub.REQUEST_PROJECT_SUB_NUM as requestProjectSubNum, sub.REQUEST_PROJECT_SUB_DATE as requestProjectSubDate, (select member_id from member where member_no = cost.gosu_no) as gosuId, (select filepath from member where member_no = cost.gosu_no) as gosuImg from gosu_request_project_sub sub LEFT JOIN gosu_request request ON sub.request_no = request.request_no LEFT JOIN gosu_request_COST cost ON sub.cost_no = cost.cost_no WHERE cost.gosu_no= #{memberNo}
mapper.update: update gosu_request_project_sub set REQUEST_PROJECT_SUB_NUM = 3 where REQUEST_PROJECT_SUB_NO = #{requestProjectSubNo}
mapper.select: select REVIEW_NO as reviewNo, GGOSU_NO as ggosuNo, WRITER as writer, REVIEW_CONTENT as reviewContent, REVIEW_NUM as reviewNum, REVIEW_DATE as reviewDate from gosu_review where GGOSU_NO = #{ggosuNo} and WRITER=#{writer}
select REVIEW_NO as reviewNo, GGOSU_NO as ggosuNo, WRITER as writer, REVIEW_CONTENT as reviewContent, REVIEW_NUM as reviewNum, REVIEW_DATE as reviewDate from gosu_review where GGOSU_NO=#{ggsouNo}
select count(*) as reviewCount from gosu_review where GGOSU_NO=#{ggsouNo}
SELECT ROUND(AVG(REVIEW_NUM),1) as reviewAvg FROM gosu_review where ggosu_no =#{ggsouNo} GROUP BY GGOSU_NO

SELECT REQUEST_REVIEW_NO as requestReviewNo, REQUEST_PROJECT_SUB_NO as requestProjectSubNo, REQUEST_MEMBER_ID as memberId, REQUEST_REVIEW_CONTENT as requestReviewContent, REQUEST_REVIEW_DATE as requestReviewDate FROM gosu_request_review where REQUEST_PROJECT_SUB_NO =#{requestProjectSubNo} and REQUEST_MEMBER_ID =#{memberId}
mapper.update: update gosu_notice set GNOTICE_TITLE = #{gnoticeTitle}, GNOTICE_CONTENT = #{gnoticeContent}, GNOTICE_PHOTO = #{gnoticePhoto} where GNOTICE_NO = #{gnoticeNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from gosu_request_review grr LEFT JOIN gosu_Request_project_sub sub ON grr.REQUEST_PROJECT_SUB_NO = sub.REQUEST_PROJECT_SUB_NO LEFT JOIN gosu_request_COST cost ON sub.cost_no = cost.cost_no LEFT JOIN gosu gosu ON cost.gosu_no = gosu.gosu_no where ggosu_no = #{ggsouNo}

select gr.REVIEW_NO as reviewNo, gr.GGOSU_NO as ggosuNo, gr.WRITER as writer, gr.REVIEW_CONTENT as reviewContent, gr.REVIEW_NUM as reviewNum, gr.REVIEW_DATE as reviewDate, m.member_id as gosuId from gosu_review gr LEFT JOIN gosu g ON gr.ggosu_no = g.ggosu_no LEFT JOIN member m ON g.gosu_no = m.member_no WHERE writer = #{memberId}

select
grr.REQUEST_REVIEW_NO as requestReviewNo, grr.REQUEST_PROJECT_SUB_NO as requestProjectSubNo, grr.REQUEST_MEMBER_ID as memberId, grr.REQUEST_REVIEW_CONTENT as requestReviewContent, grr.REQUEST_REVIEW_DATE as requestReviewDate, (select member_id from member where member_no = cost.gosu_no) as gosuId from gosu_request_review grr LEFT JOIN gosu_Request_project_sub sub ON grr.REQUEST_PROJECT_SUB_NO = sub.REQUEST_PROJECT_SUB_NO LEFT JOIN gosu_request_COST cost ON sub.cost_no = cost.cost_no LEFT JOIN gosu gosu ON cost.gosu_no = gosu.gosu_no WHERE REQUEST_MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
select count(*) from gosu
select ggosu_no as ggsouNo, gosu_no as gsouNo, gosu_title as gosuTitle, gosu_self as gosuSelf, gosu_explain as gosuExplain, gosu_act as gosuAct, gosu_cost as gosuCost, gosu_date as gosuDate from gosu

select * from( select rownum as rnum,cc.* from ( select ggosu_no as ggsouNo, gosu_no as gsouNo, gosu_title as gosuTitle, gosu_self as gosuSelf, gosu_explain as gosuExplain, gosu_act as gosuAct, gosu_cost as gosuCost, gosu_date as gosuDate from gosu order by 1 desc)cc) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

select * from (select rownum as rnum , r.* from ( select gnotice_no as gnoticeNo, member_id as writeId, gnotice_title as gnoticeTitle, gnotice_content as gnoticeContent, gnotice_photo as gnoticePhoto, gnotice_date as gnoticeDate from gosu_notice order by 1 desc )r)rr where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from gosu_notice

select * from (select rownum as rnum , r.* from ( select REQUEST_NO as requestNo, REQUEST_WRITER_NO as requestWriterNo, REQUEST_CONTENT7 as requestContent7, REQUEST_DATE as requsetDate from gosu_request order by 1 desc )r)rr where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

select * from (select rownum as rnum , r.* from ( select COST_NO as costNo, GOSU_NO as gosuNo, REQUEST_NO as requestNo, COST_CONTENT as costContent, cost, COST_DATE as costDate, MEMBER_ID as memberId from gosu_request_cost where member_id =#{memberId} AND cost_no NOT IN(select cost_no from gosu_request_project_sub) order by 1 desc )r)rr where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from gosu_request_cost where member_id =#{memberId} AND cost_no NOT IN(select cost_no from gosu_request_project_sub)

select * from( select rownum as rnum,cc.* from ( select ggosu_no as ggsouNo, gosu_no as gsouNo, gosu_title as gosuTitle, gosu_self as gosuSelf, gosu_explain as gosuExplain, gosu_act as gosuAct, gosu_cost as gosuCost, gosu_date as gosuDate from gosu
AND gosu_title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND gosu_explain LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
order by 1 desc)cc) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

select count(*) from gosu
AND gosu_title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND gosu_explain LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select * from (select rownum as rnum , r.* from ( select gnotice_no as gnoticeNo, member_id as writeId, gnotice_title as gnoticeTitle, gnotice_content as gnoticeContent, gnotice_photo as gnoticePhoto, gnotice_date as gnoticeDate from gosu_notice
AND gnotice_title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND gnotice_content LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
order by 1 desc )r)rr where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

select count(*) from gosu_notice
AND gnotice_title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND gnotice_content LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select COMMENT_NO as commentNo, MEMBER_ID as memberId, COMMENT_CONTENT as commentContent, REG_DATE as regDate, BOARD_NO as boardNo, BOARD_TYPE as boardType, COMMENT_TYPE as commentType, COMMENT_REF as commentRef, filepath as memberImg from (select rownum as rnum , r.*,(select filepath from member where member_id = r.MEMBER_ID) as filepath from (select * from comments where board_type=6 and board_no =#{gnn} order by 1 )r)rr
mapper.update: update comments set COMMENT_CONTENT = #{commentContent} where COMMENT_NO = #{commentNo}

choose.when: select * from (select rownum as rnum , r.* from ( select req.REQUEST_NO as requestNo, req.REQUEST_WRITER_NO as requestWriterNo, req.REQUEST_CONTENT7 as requestContent7, req.REQUEST_DATE as requsetDate from gosu_request req left JOIN gosu_request_cost cost ON req.request_no = cost.request_no where cost.request_no IN ( select request_no from gosu_request_cost where gosu_no = #{gosuNo} ) and cost.gosu_no = #{gosuNo} order by 1 desc)r)rr where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

select REQUEST_NO as requestNo, REQUEST_WRITER_NO as requestWriterNo, REQUEST_CONTENT7 as requestContent7, REQUEST_DATE as requsetDate from (select rownum as rnum , r.* from ( select * from gosu_request where request_no NOT IN ( select req.request_no from gosu_request req left JOIN gosu_request_cost cost ON req.request_no = cost.request_no where cost.request_no IN ( select request_no from gosu_request_cost where gosu_no = #{gosuNo} ) and cost.gosu_no = #{gosuNo})order by 1 desc)r)rr where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

select count(*) from ( select * from gosu_request req left JOIN gosu_request_cost cost ON req.request_no = cost.request_no where cost.request_no IN ( select request_no from gosu_request_cost where gosu_no = #{gosuNo} ) and cost.gosu_no = #{gosuNo} )

select count(*) from ( select * from gosu_request where request_no NOT IN ( select req.request_no from gosu_request req left JOIN gosu_request_cost cost ON req.request_no = cost.request_no where cost.request_no IN ( select request_no from gosu_request_cost where gosu_no = #{gosuNo} ) and cost.gosu_no = #{gosuNo}))

mapper.select: select req.REQUEST_NO as requestNo, req.REQUEST_WRITER_NO as requestWriterNo, req.REQUEST_CONTENT1 as requestContent1, req.REQUEST_CONTENT2 as requestContent2, req.REQUEST_CONTENT3 as requestContent3, req.REQUEST_CONTENT4 as requestContent4, req.REQUEST_CONTENT5 as requestContent5, req.REQUEST_CONTENT6 as requestContent6, req.REQUEST_CONTENT7 as requestContent7, req.REQUEST_DATE as requsetDate from gosu_request req JOIN gosu_request_cost cost ON req.request_no = cost.request_no where cost.cost_no = #{costNo} and cost.member_id = #{memberId}
